definition: handleless cup/goblet/to concentrate/variant of 鐘|钟[zhong1]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to treasure/to be very fond of
to have a special fondness (for sth)
to fall in love/to love sb or sth dearly (lover, or art)
Zhong Kui (mythological figure, supposed to drive away evil spirits)/(fig.) a person with the courage to fight against evil
Zhong Yao (151-230), minister of Cao Wei 曹魏[Cao2 Wei4] and noted calligrapher, said to have developed the regular script 楷書|楷书[kai3 shu1]
Basuki Tjahaja Purnama (1966-), Indonesian politician, governor of Jakarta (2014-)

sentences.english: The coach substituted Smith for Jones.
sentences.chinese: 教練讓史密斯上場，換下了鍾斯。

sentences.english: Candles and water clocks helped people know how much time had gone by.
sentences.chinese: 蠟燭和水鍾幫助人們知道過去了多少時間。

sentences.english: At a Chinese party the guests usually arrive 5-10 minutes early.
sentences.chinese: 中餐宴會客人凡是提前五至非常鍾到達。

sentences.english: Put the clock on one hour when the time changes.
sentences.chinese: 更改時制後，把鍾撥快一個小時。

sentences.english: The bird in the clock gaily hops out and says cuckoo.
sentences.chinese: 鍾裏的小鳥愉快地跳出來，“布穀布穀”地叫着。

sentences.english: Safe boxes, fancy clock, mini fans, timers.
sentences.chinese: 保險盒，玩具鍾，微型風扇，記時器。

sentences.english: There are three hands in a clock.
I'll finish reading the newspaper in five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 五分成鍾內我會把報紙讀完。

sentences.english: Everything is sleeping now, expect the clock and me.
sentences.chinese: 現在，除了鍾與我相伴，一切都在沉睡着。

sentences.english: Look to Zhong Xiang, still be engorge really one Jing.
sentences.chinese: 到鍾祥一看，還真是大吃了一驚。

sentences.english: Customs house's building and electronic waterfall clock also is quite new DuiJing.
sentences.chinese: 海關大樓與電子瀑布鍾也是頗有新意的對景。

sentences.english: There's a clock and two pictures.
I took a great dislike to the clock, so I chucked it in the dustbin .
sentences.chinese: 我很討厭那隻鍾，隨手就把它扔進垃圾桶裏了。

sentences.english: However Zhong Ning's ascendancy and fortune do not have conquer poplar luck.
sentences.chinese: 然而鍾寧的權勢與財富沒有徵服楊瑞。

sentences.english: Mr. Jones is away from Taipei.

definition: clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
